Rehgar.name: Chain Heal
Rehgar.description: Heal an ally with a wave of healing for 260 (+4% per level) Health. The wave then bounces 2 times to nearby allies within 7 range, restoring 260 (+4% per level) Health to them.

Rehgar.name: Lightning Shield
Rehgar.description: Imbue an ally with lightning dealing 64 (+4% per level) damage a second to nearby enemies. Each enemy hit restores 2 Mana to Rehgar. Lasts 5 seconds.

Rehgar.name: Earthbind Totem
Rehgar.description: Create a totem that Slows nearby enemies by 35%. The totem has 260 (+4% per level) Health and lasts for 6 seconds.

Rehgar.name: Bloodlust
Rehgar.description: Grant nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 35% Movement Speed and causes them to heal for 30% of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for 6 seconds.

Rehgar.name: Ancestral Healing
Rehgar.description: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 1180 (+4% per level) Health.

Rehgar.name: Purge
Rehgar.description: When used on an allied Hero, make them Unstoppable for 0.5 seconds. When used on an enemy Hero, Slow them by 80%, decaying over 2 seconds.  Cannot be cast on yourself.

Rehgar.name: Ghost Wolf
Rehgar.description: Instead of using a mount, Rehgar transforms into a Ghost Wolf with 20% increased Movement Speed. Basic Attacks in Ghost Wolf form cause him to lunge at his target and deal 75% bonus damage. Dealing damage, using Abilities, and channeling cancels Ghost Wolf form.

1.name: Stormcaller
1.description: Increase the radius of Lightning Shield by 25%.  Quest: Each time Lightning Shield damages an enemy Hero, permanently increase Rehgar's Health by 2 and Mana by 1, stacking up to 300 times.

1.name: Colossal Totem
1.description: Reactivate Earthbind Totem to move an existing totem to a new location. This can be used once per cast.  Passive: Increase the Health, area, and duration of Earthbind Totem by 50%.

1.name: Feral Heart
1.description: Ghost Wolf's Movement Speed bonus is increased to 40% for the first second, then falls to 30%. Entering or exiting Ghost Wolf form grants 15 Armor for 1 second.

4.name: Earthliving Enchant
4.description: When Chain Heal heals a Hero below 50% Health, they are healed an additional 200 (+4% per level) Health over 4 seconds.

4.name: Electric Charge
4.description: The bearer of Lightning Shield Heals for 20% of the damage it deals to enemy Heroes, doubled if the bearer is Rehgar.  While Lightning Shield is damaging an enemy, its bearer gains 10% increased Movement Speed.

4.name: Healing Totem
4.description: Activate to place a Totem that heals allied Heroes in an area for 2% of their maximum Health every second. This Totem has 125 (+4% per level) Health and lasts for 10 seconds.

7.name: Grounded Totem
7.description: Enemy Heroes in Earthbind Totem's area also have their Attack Speed Slowed by 30% and their Spell Power reduced by 15%.  Passive: Increase Earthbind Totem's range by 50%.

7.name: Purification
7.description: If Purge removes a Slow, Stun, Root, or Silence effect from an ally, heal them for 220 (+4% per level).  Using Purge on an enemy Hero deals up to 330 (+4% per level) damage to Shields and reduces healing received by 40% for 2 seconds.  Passive: Reduce Purge's cooldown by 10 seconds.

7.name: Blood and Thunder
7.description: Ghost Wolf attacks reduce Basic Ability cooldowns by 1.5 seconds and restore 5% of Rehgar's maximum Mana.

10.name: Ancestral Healing
10.description: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 1180 (+4% per level) Health.

10.name: Bloodlust
10.description: Grant nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 35% Movement Speed and causes them to heal for 30% of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for 6 seconds.

13.name: Tidal Waves
13.description: Reduces Chain Heal's cooldown by 1 second for each Hero healed, and reduces its Mana cost from 60 to 40.

13.name: Earth Shield
13.description: Lightning Shield gives Heroes a Shield that absorbs damage equal to 14% of their maximum Health for 3 seconds.

13.name: Wellspring
13.description: Every 2 seconds, Earthbind Totem will cast an untalented Chain Heal at the nearest allied Hero with the lowest Health. This Chain Heal heals for 35% of its normal amount.

16.name: Rising Storm
16.description: Every time a Lighting Shield damages an enemy Hero, increase its damage by 10%. Stacks up to 15 times.  Passive: Increase the duration of Lightning Shield by 3 seconds.

16.name: Earthgrasp Totem
16.description: When Earthbind Totem is first cast, it deals 145 (+4% per level) damage and Slows nearby enemies by 90% for 1 second.

16.name: Hunger of the Wolf
16.description: Ghost Wolf attacks against Heroes deal an additional 6% of the target's maximum Health and heal Rehgar for 6% of his maximum Health.

20.name: Farseer's Blessing
20.description: After 1.5 seconds, Ancestral Healing is cast a second time on the same target. Allies near the target are healed for 590 (+4% per level).

20.name: Gladiator's War Shout
20.description: Increase the duration and range of Bloodlust by 100%.

20.name: Elemental Conduit
20.description: Activate to gain Lightning Shield and grant all nearby allied Heroes a Shield equal to 10% of their maximum Health for 5 seconds.  For up to 5 seconds after activating, hitting an enemy Hero with this effects' Lightning Shield gives nearby allies a Shield equal to 1.5% of their maximum Health for 5 seconds.

20.name: Pit Fighter
20.description: Gain 10% increased Attack Damage and 3 Spell Power. Each nearby ally Hero grants an additional stack of this effect, up to 5 stacks.  While at 2 or more stacks, Purge's cooldown refreshes 50% faster.
